entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:53 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 1:52 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 1:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 1:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
